item.title: What are CPU Architectures & ISAs? ELI5
item.description: We all probably have heard them: ARM, RISC-V, CISC, x86, x64, AARCH64, AMD64â€¦ Why are there so many of them? Why do they sound so mathematical and scientific? And most importantly What do they even mean? Here in this article I will try to clear the confessions about all the terms above. I will talk about CPUs, CPU architectures and instruction sets. At the end, you will have the fundamental understanding of their meaning and their place in this big tech world.
